ComicInfo.Summary:
Our three most popular Danger Zone titles: Zombie Tramp, Vampblade, and DollFace come together to form the all-new Danger Doll Squad! When each girl’s deadliest foes merge together, our terrible threesome must enter “the black room”, a virtual reality inside cyberspace, to do battle against Necro Magic AI!!!
The biggest Danger Zone crossover event starts here, with covers by the artist of each series (each with their own risqué variant as well)!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|----------------------------------------------|---------------|------------------| | A | Regular Cover | Celor | 1 | | B | Risqué Cover, Limited to 2500 | Celor | 2 | | C | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Dan Mendoza | 3 | | D | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Dan Mendoza | 4 | | E | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Winston Young | 5 | | F | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Winston Young | 6 | | G | Blank Variant Cover | None | 7 |
ComicInfo.Title: Part One
